author: cms-btv-pog
body:
The TMVAEvaluator class added to CommonTools/Utils. This is a partial backport of #9673.

**Update (June 22, 2015):** Now that #9150 was merged, this PR has been rebased to CMSSW_7_4_6 and its scope slightly extended by also backporting the BoostedDoubleSV changes from #9673.
title: Added TMVAEvaluator class
